title_advert: ['Stunning studio located on trunk of Palm Jumeirah']
amenities:
["Furnished
Balcony
Built in Wardrobes
Central A/C
Children's Play Area
Children's Pool
Concierge
Covered Parking
Kitchen Appliances
Lobby in Building
Maid Service
Networked
Security
Shared Gym
Shared Pool
Vastu-compliant
View of Landmark
View of Water
Walk-in Closet"]
descriptions:
['DescriptionSE7EN RESIDENCES re-branded as SEVEN PALM 
BEACHFRONT APARTMENTS ON PALM JUMEIRAH 
Seven Palm embodies urban island living close to the center of Dubai. Nestled in between five-star DUKES The Palm and Oceana Residences on one side and Fairmont The Palm on the other. Walking distance to Nakheel Shopping Mall, Monorail stations, Al Itihad Park and Golden Mile Gallery.
Seven Palm offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Ocean, Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and the Dubai Eye. 
A luxury hotel will be situated in the South tower of the Seven Palm project and the residences are located in the North tower. The towers are joined at the top by a stunning one-of-a-kind infinity pool and food and beverage outlets catering to the wants and needs of residents and visitors alike. 
Studio apartments feature high quality furnishings maximizing space with flat screen televisions, fully equipped kitchens and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Imagine relaxed living in an exceptional one, two or three bedroom apartment featuring high quality furnishings, separate air-conditioning controls, flat screen televisions in the living and master bedroom, guest toilet, en-suite master bedroom, walk-in wardrobes, fully equipped kitchens and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Duplex penthouses feature private terraces with swimming pools and access to the rooftop infinity swimming pool. Both penthouses have bright open layouts and can be fitted out to your own taste. 
Amenities include an Olympic size rooftop infinity pool in length, fully equipped gymnasium, beach access, lush landscaped gardens and secure underground parking. 
This project is sold off-plan with expected completion due by Q4 – 2020 to all nationalities on a freehold ownership basis.
Visit our sales office located at DUKES The Palm Hotel or call us for your exclusive viewing TODAY!']

descriptions: ['DescriptionENGLAND CLUSTER, 1 BEDROOM FULLY FURNISHED WITH BALCONY FOR SALEReference Number: RC-S-14030Vacant Affordable Luxury Apartment\xa0Upgraded, furnished, equipped 1 bedroom apartment.Balcony with a stunning view on 18-century England Cluster Architecture.Eco-décor materials:* Bamboo floor,* Natural stone walls,* Cherry wood framing.* Fully furnished and equipped with consideration of design and quality.* Bath with Jacuzzi massage, multi-jets shower cabin, original art-works, * Automatic climate control system with air cleaning, ionization, humidifying features,* Huge Smart LED TV with HIFI system, big Aquarium, LED-lights, many more.*Greening around, playground, groceries, cafeterias, gym, shopping malls close.*Quiet family building with CCTV, 24/7 security, cheap service charges, free parking.*Door video phone and smart-lockInternational City offers affordable living in a flourishing residential district. With over 22,000 residences, including spacious studios and one-bedroom apartments, spread throughout ten distinctly themed precincts, residents can enjoy a range of sports facilities, lush communal green spaces and the tranquil environment of the lake, together with efficient community infrastructure. The development also houses over 5,000 retail units on the ground floors of the 387 buildings, offering a range of essential community services and stores, from cozy cafés and restaurants to conveniently located supermarkets, laundries, and offices.Call Dayian Nadeem on +971565786772 / +97143588070 or visit www.dubaifirsthome.com for further details.RERA PERMIT No. 31599 Ref #\xa02128765984']
